alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Vilas County through 645 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Phelps, or 14 miles northeast of Eagle River, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phelps, Land O Lakes and Lac Vieux Desert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
